thread.title: TiVo Corporation Announces 2017 Q4 and Year-End Results and Conference Call Scheduled for February 27, 2018

author: cnbc.com
title: TiVo Corporation Announces 2017 Q4 and Year-End Results and Conference Call Scheduled for February 27, 2018
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- TiVo Corporation (NASDAQ: TIVO) announced today that it plans to release its 2017 fourth quarter and year-end results on February 27, 2018.
TiVo also plans to host a conference call at 5:00 p.m. ET on February 27, 2018 to discuss its financial results. Investors and analysts interested in participating in the conference are welcome to call (866) 621-1214 (or international +1-706- 643-4013) and reference conference ID 4068257. The conference call may also be accessed via live webcast in the Investor Relations section of TiVo’s website at http://www.tivo.com .
A replay of the audio webcast will be available on TiVo’s website shortly after the live call ends, and we currently plan for it to remain on TiVo’s website until the next quarterly earnings call. Additionally, a telephonic replay of the call may be accessible shortly after the live call ends through March 6, 2018 by dialing (855) 859-2056 (or international +1-404-537-3406) and entering conference ID 4068257.
About TiVo Corporation
TiVo (NASDAQ: TIVO) is a global leader in entertainment technology and audience insights. From the interactive program guide to the DVR, TiVo delivers innovative products and licensable technologies that revolutionize how people find content across a changing media landscape. TiVo enables the world’s leading media and entertainment providers to deliver the ultimate entertainment experience. Explore the next generation of entertainment at tivo.com , forward.tivo.com or follow us on Twitter @tivo or @tivoforbusiness.
